Docs.summary: Determines whether an object can be coerced to the type of another object. This class belongs to the abstract syntax tree category.

Docs.param: The object to coerce to the type of object v2.

Docs.summary: Determines whether the first specified object can be coerced to the type of the second specified object.
Docs.returns: if can be coerced to the type of object *v2*; otherwise, .
